p: In 2010, the UNFCCC parties agreed that future global warming should be limited to less than 2°C related to pre-industrial levels [7]. According to the 2015 Paris Agreement, this fact was confirmed. With the 1.5°C Special Report on Global Warming, the International Climate Change Group highlighted the benefits of keeping global warming below this level, suggesting a global collective effort that can be guided by the 2015 United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.
